title: First look at Megan McKenna's X Factor: Celebrity audition
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Megan Mckenna is looking to make her dreams come true on the new X Factor: Celebrity.

After heading off to Texas earlier this year to write her own album, the star is now hoping to get a recording deal from Simon Cowell.

And what better way than to enter his popular singing competition.

Taking to the stage in tonight’s episode, the 27-year-old will be singing one of her originals, with the hope to impress the judges.

‘This is like the biggest opportunity that I have had in my entire life,’ she explained in the VT before adding: ‘Let’s hope that they like it.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

She continued: ‘I am just a normal girl that just wants to make it and make her dreams come true.

First look at Megan McKenna’s X Factor: Celebrity audition (Picture: Rex)

‘I would love to be able to do this full time, to be able to get a recording contract by Mr. Simon Cowell is something I have always dreamed of.’

Taking to the stage, Louis Walsh asked the Towie star if she is feeling okay, to which she replied: ‘This is a massive deal for me.

‘My passion and my love is with music, so I’m going to sing an original for you tonight. This song is called Everything But You, I wrote it a few years ago.

‘I put all my emotions down on paper so I hope you listen to my story.’

She sang her own song to become bookies’ favourite (Picture: WireImage)

Megan is currently the bookies favourite to win the show after she was tipped by Coral with the odds 3-1.

Talking about her performance, she said: ‘I sang two of my songs at HQ in front of Pete Waterman today, what a legend! He said they were really good and he really, really liked them.

‘He actually thinks one of them is better, so I’m going to be singing that one for the judges now. So, it was a bit of a last minute thing. But it’s fine as they are my own songs.’

The star added: ‘I can’t believe we’re all finally performing today. I feel sick with nerves. I just can’t believe I’m about to get another shot at this.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I guess this is like Judges Houses stage of the completion but I’ve never made it this far the other times I’ve auditioned for the show, so I’m feeling the pressure.

‘I feel sick with nerves because I just want Simon, Nicole and Louis to like what I’m about.’

The X Factor: Celebrity continues tonight on ITV.

description: First look at Megan McKenna's X Factor: Celebrity audition as she sings own song to become bookies’ favourite to win.
